description:
"Solve Quizzes to Protect Daedo with TOBOT!"

"TOBOT: Action Quiz Heroes" is an action-packed quiz game that combines thrilling battles with various trivia quizzes.

============================

▣ An exciting combination of "Quiz + Action"
▣ Defeat villainous robots with TOBOT!
▣ Various trivia quizzes on science, history, daily life, and more
▣ Climb the ranking and compete with friends by collecting points 
▣ Easy to play for people of all ages!!

============================

Fight off the villainous robots by answering quizzes, defeat them, and become a true hero!
